titleInfo.title: A service in celebration of the life of Laurance Spelman Rockefeller, September 9, 2004...the Riverside Church, New York, New York.
Memorial service for Laurance Spelman Rockefeller; LSR: Memorial service, September 9, 2004, the Riverside Church.

mods.note: Copy 1 includes 2-CD album: LSR: memorial service, September 9, 2004, the Riverside Church; Includes Reflections" by Larry Rockefeller, Lucy R. Waletzky, Marion R. Weber, David Rockefeller, Laura R. Chasin, Naomi F. Waletzky"
mods.abstract: Includes: Interment service, Rockefeller family cemetery, July 16, 2004, readings and prayer by Steven C. Rockefeller.
